pages.text: Crabs can be found in Beaches. On death may drop Crab Legs or Crab Shells.$(br2)Crab Legs can be eaten, and you can cooked them to obtain Cooked Crab Legs.$(br2)Crab Shells can be brewed into a $(l:patchouli:potions/quark/knockback_resistance)Potion of Knockback Resistance$(/l).$(br2)Crabs can be bred with Wheat, Chicken or any kind of Fish.
If a near Jukebox it's playing a music disc near of a Crab, it will start dancing to the rhythm of the music.
